sentences.sContent: He is conducting a point-by-point rebuttal of charges from former colleagues.
sentences.sCn: 他正在对前同事的指责逐条加以驳斥。

remMethod.val: re(反) ＋ butt(顶撞) + al → 反过来顶撞 → 反驳

trans.tranOther: If you make a rebuttal of a charge or accusation that has been made against you, you make a statement that gives reasons why the accusation is untrue
